name: Annihilator (Night0)
description:
This is Annihilator, a game I made for a class project. All sprites and animations were custom made.

In this Galaga inspired space shooter, you defend your mothership as invading missiles bombard your station. Survive as long as you can to reach a high score.

Killing enemies has a chance to drop one of three power-ups. Each have different effects and help you survive the onslaught. The player may also switch between three different guns, each with different behaviors.

~ CONTROLS ~

<- : Move Left

-> : Move Right

Space : Shoot

1 : Switch to Gun 1

2 : Switch to Gun 2

3 : Switch to Gun 3

Esc : Pause
